I am Abdullah The

View My Work

I specialize In

HTML5 as well as CSS3 with extraordinary talent in Website Designing, and Website Development.

HTML5

The HyperText Markup Language, or HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

CSS3

Cascading Style Sheets is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language such as HTML.

Git

Git is software for tracking changes in any set of files, usually used for coordinating work among programmers collaboratively developing source code during software development. Its goals include speed, data integrity, and support for distributed, non-linear workflows.

Github

GitHub, Inc. is a provider of Internet hosting for software development and version control using Git. It offers the distributed version control and source code management functionality of Git, plus its own features.

My Creative Process

All of my developing and Designing projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Discuss the concepts and content of the project for building an enhanced formula and procedure for completion of the project.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Brainstorming is always the first step for building the most accurate procedure for project completion.

3

Planning

Based on the result from the discussion and brainstorming the plans will be formed to start actual work on the project.

4

Interaction

During the work on project active interaction and communication for creating a dynamic work environment is always considered.
